title: Jungle looking for a team
body: Hellow, I am a jungle currently in silver, but don't let that sway your decicision, I am able to perform my job with every jungle possible, there is nothing I can't perform. give me a chance and I'll show you what i can do.

replies.body: whats your view on the shift to tank junglers and bruiser junglers with the new tank item? and the respective power level of AP junglers due to this shift?

> [{quoted}](name=KingDinger,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=ANEEQTn1,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-16T05:04:37.604+0000)
>
> whats your view on the shift to tank junglers and bruiser junglers with the new tank item? and the respective power level of AP junglers due to this shift?

Tank jgs like shen that help a lot in teams are making a reappearance because he now has really decent clear speed and cc as well as some utility and a lot of map presence. 
Jgs like Sej which was already strong got stronger able to clear faster later on and having a lot of cc and damage while being tanky. 
Jgs like Vi/Rek'sai with the new tank item won't be likely as they like the cd on warrior which is a huge reason why the tank item is only viable on people with low cd/don't require cd so they will stick with warrior.
Ap jgs like Diana are now making a comeback with the damage reduction on monster camps and allow her to thrive without the sustain if played right she has weak ganks pre 6 like always but most jgs won't gank till late lvl 3/early  4 as they like to back for jg item so this makes her really viable now.
Devourer is still a good item on jgs like Xin, Yi, and Aatrox who like that atk spe because they are mostly aa oriented with an increase damage ability Xin's Q, Yi's E and Aatrox's W which they want to get off as fast as possible.

> [{quoted}](name=KingDinger,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=ANEEQTn1,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-03-16T08:26:50.999+0000)
>
> did i %%%%ing ask you?
> 
> am i looking to recruit you onto a ranked team?
> 
> do i give damn about devo?

LOL.. You sounds like a good team member
nah dude, just having some fun trollin.

To be fair i was drunk when i wrote this. 
To answer the tank question I love playing tanks but sadly can't do in solo much as they are fairly reliant on team synergy to make an impact.
The recent changes to cinderhulk have made tanks more of a solo threat, giving us sunfire early brings our late game into mid game which is very nice, unfortunately it funnels us into ten boots for the most part, granted you can just get the iron but it's not too cost effective until late.
AP junglers in my opinion are generally sub par, bar fiddle is used correctly, people like to play fizz but if your team isn't blind he should be a near not issue until mid, even then your jungler should have been able to %%%% him up with counters all the way up to that point.
Bruiser junglers are on top and I don't see that changing until the meta changes, granted this is mostly for solo queue or teams without much spread skill but yea, currently bruiser is the way to go if you want to be able to contribute to the damage.

TL;dr, tanks aren't near S teir in solo queue but are great in 5's when able to work together.

P.S im still pretty drunk

Hello, I am a Prince from the unknown eSports team of Zimubuamidabi. I am currently in bronze exile, but for the low cost of just letting me join your 5v5 team of decent players, I will be able to unlock all my skills and send them your way as thank you.

What could go wrong.
By the way, I make fun, but, everyone deserves a few chances, give him a go (and hey, even me if you want =P)
